user.title: sHome Login
user.description:
Enter your sHome credentials

The device ID is typically a 16-character hex value. It is recommended to use the default generated value.

If device login fails, check the sHome app settings under My Account -> Family Device Management to ensure that all 8 slots are filled and remove any unused devices.

select_device.title: Select Devices
select_device.description: Select the devices you want to add
